file_content.text: Welcome to the Voss Orbital Docking Station. This--oh, it's you. Do let me know if there's anything I can do for you.
Welcome to the Voss Orbital Docking Station. This facility offers state-of-the-art amenities, such as a pressurized interior and radiation shielding.
We hope you will enjoy your stay on this station, as access to the planet is strictly prohibited.
No droid tells a Lord of the Sith where to go.
I go where I choose.
This is an Imperial edict. No one is to go to Voss without permission.
I'm not interested in debating the rules with you, just let me through.
I don't have time for this.
By Imperial edict, no one goes to Voss without permission. You don't have permission. End of debate.
I want to speak to someone more significant.
Who is in charge here?
My orders come from an Imperial edict. You won't find anyone here willing to countermand that.
Why is it prohibited?
The negotiations on Voss are complex, requiring subtlety, and are far too important for just any--
Incoming transmission.
My apologies. It, ah, seems Darth Serevin requests the honor of your presence in the Imperial Embassy at Voss-Ka at your earliest convenience.
Get out of my way, and I'll speak with him now.
At once.
Of course.
Why does he want to see me?
Darth Serevin only asked that you be invited to the embassy as soon as you arrived.
The shuttle is this way. Please don't keep Darth Serevin waiting, he's terribly important.
I have things to do before I go to the planet.
He can wait. [Refuse quest]
Of course. I suggest, however, that you don't keep Darth Serevin waiting long.
I'm sorry, I'll be with you shortly.
